name: Shopping Simulator 2k20 - COVID Edition
description:
This is a submission to the 7th Klagenfurt GameJam, the topic was "#togetherapart".

In this game, you play as a shopkeeper during the COVID-19 pandemic and have to strategically place the object for all your customers in a way that they keep their distance to each other when they come and work through their shopping lists. Can you survive the harsh times without having the pandemic spread in your shop?

Special thanks to Gabe for the awesome product sprites :)
